value.halfverse: do not be jealous of those who do wrong.
value.verse: Do not fret yourself because of evildoers; *
For they shall soon wither like the grass, *
value.halfverse: and like the green grass fade away.
dwell in the land and feed on its riches.
value.verse: Put your trust in the LORD and do good; *

value.halfverse: and he shall give you your heartâ€™s desire.
and he will bring it to pass.
value.verse: Commit your way to the LORD and put your trust in him, *

value.halfverse: and your just dealing as the noonday.
value.verse: He will make your righteousness as clear as the light *

value.halfverse: the one who succeeds in evil schemes.
value.verse: Do not fret yourself over the one who prospers, *

value.halfverse: do not fret yourself; it leads only to evil.
value.verse: Refrain from anger, leave rage alone; *

value.halfverse: but those who wait upon the LORD shall possess the land.
value.verse: For evildoers shall be cut off, *

value.halfverse: you shall search out their place, but they will not be there.
value.verse: In a little while the wicked shall be no more; *

value.halfverse: they will delight in abundance of peace.
value.verse: But the lowly shall possess the land; *
The wicked plot against the righteous *
value.halfverse: and gnash at them with their teeth.

value.verse: The Lord laughs at the wicked, *
value.halfverse: because he sees that their day will come.
to slaughter those who are upright in their ways.
value.verse:
The wicked draw their sword and bend their bow
to strike down the poor and needy, *

value.halfverse: and their bow shall be broken.
value.verse: Their sword shall go through their own heart, *

value.halfverse: is better than great riches of the wicked.
value.verse: The little that the righteous has *
For the power of the wicked shall be broken, *
value.halfverse: but the LORD upholds the righteous.
